content: Notification: Policy revision #PHX-CARD-2023-09 effective October 1 mandates pre-authorization for advanced genetic testing related to cardiomyopathies. Impacted members include those with ICD-10 codes I42.8-I42.9 and participant IDs beginning with PX. Provider queries should be directed to geneticcounseling@azhh.com or (602) 555-0172. Processing times may increase during transition period.
